item.title: Simple Valentineâ€™s Day Project with JS
item.description: Introduction This JavaScript project is an interactive application where users can interact with “Yes” and “No” buttons to change the displayed image. When the user clicks the “Yes” button, the image switches to another one, and similarly, clicking the “No” button triggers a change in the displayed image. Each time the user performs an action, the displayed image changes, creating an engaging and visually appealing experience. HTML Code Let’s build a structure of our project with HTML.
